refnamediv.refpurpose: Old API that is still available but declared as deprecated.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: These functions are not defined if you #define GIMP_DISABLE_DEPRECATED.

refsect2.title: gimp_int_option_menu_new ()
refsect2.programlisting: GtkWidget * gimp_int_option_menu_new (gboolean menu_only, GCallback menu_item_callback, gpointer menu_item_callback_data, gint initial, ...);

warning.para: gimp_int_option_menu_new is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Convenience function to create a GtkOptionMenu or a GtkMenu. This function does the same thing as the deprecated function gimp_option_menu_new2(), but it takes integers as item_data instead of pointers, since that is a very common case (mapping an enum to a menu).

listitem.simpara: TRUE if the function should return a GtkMenu only.
The callback each menu item's "activate" signal will be connected with.
The data which will be passed to g_signal_connect().
The item_data of the initially selected menu item.
A NULL-terminated va_list describing the menu items.
A GtkOptionMenu or a GtkMenu (depending on menu_only).

refsect2.title: gimp_int_option_menu_set_history ()

warning.para: gimp_int_option_menu_set_history is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Iterates over all entries in a GtkOptionMenu and selects the one with the matching item_data. Probably only makes sense to use with a GtkOptionMenu that was created using gimp_int_option_menu_new(). This function does the same thing as gimp_option_menu_set_history(), but takes integers as item_data instead of pointers.

listitem.simpara: A GtkOptionMenu as returned by gimp_int_option_menu_new().
The item_data of the menu item you want to select.

warning.para: GimpIntOptionMenuSensitivityCallback is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.title: gimp_int_option_menu_set_sensitive ()

warning.para: gimp_int_option_menu_set_sensitive is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Calls the given callback for each item in the menu and passes it the item_data and the callback_data. The menu item's sensitivity is set according to the return value of this function. This function does the same thing as gimp_option_menu_set_sensitive(), but takes integers as item_data instead of pointers.

listitem.simpara: a GtkOptionMenu as returned by gimp_option_menu_new() or gimp_option_menu_new2().
a function called for each item in the menu to determine the the sensitivity state.
data to pass to the callback function.
